```{r}
library(readr)
library(dplyr)
setwd('scripts/r')
source('data-utils.R')
prad <- read_delim('../../download/mrna-rsem-normalized-2015-11-01/gdac.broadinstitute.org_PRAD.Merge_rnaseqv2__illuminahiseq_rnaseqv2__unc_edu__Level_3__RSEM_genes_normalized__data.Level_3.2015110100.0.0/PRAD.rnaseqv2__illuminahiseq_rnaseqv2__unc_edu__Level_3__RSEM_genes_normalized__data.data.txt', delim = '\t')

raw.counts <- prad[-1,]
raw.counts$HybRefShort <- hyb.ref.short(raw.counts)

tumor.name <- 'PRAD'

data <- get.gene.table(raw.counts, tumor.name)$gene.table 
data$`Hybridization REF` <- NULL
r <- rownames(data)
data <- as.data.frame(sapply(data[,-1], as.numeric))
rownames(data) <- r
data <- as.data.frame(t(data))

subtypes.raw <- read.csv('../../data/Table_S1_PRAD.csv', sep = ';', stringsAsFactors = F)

data$PATIENT_ID <- sub('(\\w+-\\w+-\\w+).*', '\\1', rownames(data))

subtype.data <- data %>% inner_join(subtypes.raw, by = c('PATIENT_ID' = 'PATIENT_ID'))

a <- aov(subtype.data$ZNF195 ~ subtype.data$Subtype)
t.hsd <- TukeyHSD(a)
```



data$subtype <- sapply(rownames(data), function(rowname) {
  matching.indices <- sapply(subtypes.raw$SAMPLE_ID, function(s) grepl(s, rowname))
  if (length(which(matching.indices == T)) == 0) {
    NA
  } else {
    as.character(subtypes.raw[matching.indices,c('Subtype')])
  }
})

subtypes.raw <- read.csv('../../data/Table_S1_PRAD.csv', sep = ';')

first.row <- filtered.counts[1,]

for (cc in 1:nrow(subtypes.raw)) {
  c <- subtypes.raw[cc,]$SAMPLE_ID
  s <- as.character(subtypes.raw[cc,]$Subtype)
  w <- which(grepl(c, colnames(first.row)) == T)
  if (length(w) != 0){
    print(s)
    colnames(first.row)[w] <- s
  }
}
colnames(first.row)

x <- first.row[,!grepl('TCGA', colnames(first.row))]

colnames(x) <- sub('\\..*', '', colnames(x))

x <- t(x)

for (c in unique(rownames(x))) {
  z <- x[rownames(x) == c]
  print(sprintf('%s: %s', toString(c), toString(z)))
  qqnorm(as.numeric(z))
}

            rep('ETV4', length(ETV4)), rep('SPOP', length(SPOP)))

all <- c(ESG, ETV, FLI, other, ETV4, SPOP)

bartlett.test(all, groups)


a <- aov(all ~ groups)
